Key Match Events: Lonzo Ball made his return to an NBA floor when the Chicago Bulls hosted the Minnesota Timberwolves at the United Center.
Lonzo Ball scored 10 points on 4-6 field goals and 2-4 three-pointers in 15 minutes.
The Bulls won by a score of 125-123.
Post-Match Reflections: Thousands of people reacted to Lonzo Ball making his return.
LaMelo Ball, Lonzo's brother, reacted to his return with a social media post that had over 15,000 likes and 400,000 impressions in three hours.
